mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import re

def probe_word_group_frequency(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', phrase1.lower())
    words2 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', phrase2.lower())
    ctr1 = Counter(words1)
    ctr2 = Counter(words2)
    return ctr1 != ctr2

from collections import Counter
import re

def probe_word_group_frequency(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('', phrase1.lower())
    words2 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', phrase2.lower())
    ctr1 = Counter(words1)
    ctr2 = Counter(words2)
    return ctr1 == ctr2

from collections import Counter
import re

def probe_word_group_frequency(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    words1 = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', phrase1.lower())
    words2 = re.findall('', phrase2.lower())
    ctr1 = Counter(words1)
    ctr2 = Counter(words2)
    return ctr1 == ctr2
